item.title: Selling Simplicity
item.dc:creator: coreysnipes
item.description:
I’m a big fan of simplicity, both in design & execution. It’s definitely a marketing challenge. I’m curious what words your customers who LOVE Perch use to describe it. Do they call it “simple”? (If so, maybe your marketing problem isn’t as big as you think.) Other terms that convey the same essence for me are: elegant, clean, powerful-but-easy-to-use.

Selling Simplicity

The problem we have with marketing Perch is that at the core of Perch is simplicity. In this post I write about why that is important, but why it presents us with a constant marketing challenge.
